question: They had a great time in Xi’an. []
background: 阅读短文，判断句子正(T)误(F)。Last summer holiday, Mary went to Xi’an with her family. They went there by plane and stayed there for three days. On the first day, they went to Tang Paradise(大唐芙蓉园). The next day, they visited Shaanxi History Museum(陕西历史博物馆) and Huaqing Pool(华清池). The last day, they went to visit the Bell Tower. And they also went to Kaiyuan Shopping Mal(开元商城). Then they ate some delicious food. After that, they bought some gifts for their friends, too. They had a great time in Xi’an. They went back home by train.
label: QA

background: 阅读理解 Ben gets up at six thirty every day. His home is near his school. He goes to school at 7:30. Classes begin at 8:00. He has lunch at twelve at home. After lunch he plays games with his friends. In the afternoon, Ben has three lessons. He goes home at five thirty.

background: 阅读理解。根据短文内容，判断正确(T)还是错误(F)。My name is John. Joe is my pen pal. He lives in the city. He weighs 55 kilograms. He is 160 centimetres. He goes to school by bus every day. He likes dancing and drawing pictures. There are a lot of tall buildings in the city. There are a lot of shops and restaurants too. Joe often goes to the cinema to see films. He often goes to museums too. I live in the countryside. I weigh 50 kilograms. I am 157 centimetres. I go to school on foot. I like playing football and singing. There are a lot of rivers and mountains in my hometown. I usually swim in the river in summer. I often play games in the mountains.

question: The old lady beats the cat because it can’t bite the fish. []
background: 根据短文内容，判断句子对错，对的写T, 错误的写F。An old lady has a cat. The cat is very old. She can't run fast, and she can’t bite. When the old cat sees a mouse, she jumps to it and catches it, but the mouse still gets out of her mouth and runs away. Then the old lady is very angry. She begins to beat the cat. The cat says to her, “Don’t beat me. Please be kind to me. When I was young, I gave you a lot of help.
label: QA

question: Who is Jenny?[]
answer: She is an English girl./ An English girl.
background: 阅读短文，根据要求完成下面各小题。Wang Nan is my friend. She comes from England. She is in Beijing now.  Here is a photo of her family. These are her father, mother and sisters. Who is that girl? Oh, she is an English girl. Jenny is her first name. Brown is her last name. She is Wang Nan’s cousin.（一）根据短文内容简要回答问题。
label: QA

question: 请给短文拟一个适当的题目。[]
answer: A photo of family / Wang Nan’s family photo
background: 阅读短文，根据要求完成下面各小题。Wang Nan is my friend. She comes from England. She is in Beijing now.  Here is a photo of her family. These are her father, mother and sisters. Who is that girl? Oh, she is an English girl. Jenny is her first name. Brown is her last name. She is Wang Nan’s cousin.（一）根据短文内容简要回答问题。
label: QA

question: What’s Jenny’s last name?[]
background: 阅读短文，根据要求完成下面各小题。Wang Nan is my friend. She comes from England. She is in Beijing now.  Here is a photo of her family. These are her father, mother and sisters. Who is that girl? question: Most of the stars are smaller than the sun.[]
background: 阅读理解，判断下面的句子是否与短文的意思相同。 ;The sun, the moon and the stars are all in the sky. We see the sun in the day. We see the moon and the stars at night. The sun is a ball. It is bigger than the moon. The sun has a family. It is the biggest in the family. The moon is a ball, too. It is much smaller than the sun. It is smaller than the stars. The light on the moon comes from the sun. The stars look smaller than the sun and the moon. But most of the stars are bigger than the sun. They are very far away from us, so they look small. All day the stars are in the sky. But the light from the sun is too bright. We cannot see the stars in the day.
label: QA

question: What did they do on Saturday evening?[]
background: 阅读短文并回答问题。My name is Chen Jie. I'm twelve years old. Yesterday was Saturday. I had no classes. My parents and I had a picnic in the park. We got up at six o'clock. My mother cooked breakfast for us. We went to the park by car. In the park, my father read a book under a big tree. My mother listened to music. I played with my dog and ate good food. We went back home at 4 o'clock. In the evening I watched TV with my parents. Yesterday was a nice day.
label: QA

question: Zhang Peng follows the traffic rules.[]
background: 阅读对话，判断对(T)错(F)。Zhang: Excuse me, how do we get to the People's Park?Man: You can go there by the No. 5 bus, or you can go on foot.Zhang: How do we go on foot?Man: It's easy. Turn left at the traffic lights. The park is near a tall office building.John: Thank you very much. Hurry up, Zhang Peng!Zhang: No! The light is red. Stop!John: That's right. We have to wait.Zhang: Now it's green. Let's go!
label: QA

question: They took the boy to a hospital and he was saved. []
background: 阅读理解It snowed hard that day. Mike and his friends went to skate on the lake. May could not skate. Mike taught her. Jim wanted to skate in the middle of the lake, Jane stopped him. But he didn’t listen to her. After a few minutes they heard him calling for help. “Help! Help!” Then they found he fell into the cold water. They ran to him and May, the youngest of them, shouted loudly there. A farmer worked near the lake and heard her. He took off his coat and jumped into the water and helped the boy go out. Their clothes were all wet. He took the boy to a hospital. Jim’s parents thanked him very much.判断下列句子是否与短文相符，相符的写“T”，不相符的写“F”
label: QA

question: go, check, and, will, I(.)[]
background: 连词成句
original: （1）根据所给单词，我们可以知道句子的大概意思是：“我需要你的意见。”，也就是“I need your advice.”；（2）根据所给单词，我们可以知道句子的大概意思是：“我真的抱歉，爸爸。”，也就是“I am really sorry，Dad.”；（3）根据所给单词，我们可以知道句子的大概意思是：“你可能按错健了。”，也就是“Maybe you pressed the wrong switch.”；（4）根据所给单词，我们可以知道句子的大概意思是：“你不应该玩电脑游戏。”，也就是“You shouldn’t play computer games.”；（5）根据所给单词，我们可以知道句子的大概意思是：“我将去检查。”，也就是“I will go and check.
label: QA

question: Jim always watches TV in the evening.[]
background: 阅读短文，判断正(T)误(F)。Jim is a pupil. He often walks to school at seven thirty. Sometimes he rides his bike. He is in Class Two, Grade Six. He has four classes in the morning and two classes in the afternoon. He learns Chinese and English. Jim likes swimming, skating and ball games. In the afternoon, he often plays basketball with his classmates. He goes home at 5:00. He often does his homework in the evening. Sometimes he watches TV for an hour. He goes to bed at 9:00.
label: QA

question: 阅读短文，判断下面的句子与短文内容是(T)否(F)相符。(1) The giraffe is the tallest and the heaviest of the three.（_____）(2) The panda is heavier than the giraffe. （_____）(3) The pig is taller than the panda. （_____）(4) Pandas like eating bamboo but the giraffe likes leaves. （_____）(5) The pig is the heaviest of the three. （_____）上述判断答案依次是[]
background: 任务型阅读。阅读短文，完成下面的任务。Look at these three animals. They are the giraffe, the panda and the pig. The giraffe is the tallest and the heaviest of the three. It is 5.48 metres. It’s really tall. It’s 900 kilograms! It likes eating leaves. The panda is shorter than the giraffe. It is 1.02 metres. But It’s taller than the pig. It’s 78 kilograms. It’s heavier than the pig, too. It likes eating bamboo. The pig is the shortest. It’s only 67 cm tall. How heavy is it? It’s 55 kilograms.
label: QA

question: 根据短文内容完成表格。Giraffe,Panda and Pig Height: 5.48 ______1.02 ______67 cm,Weight: 900 ______78 ______55 ______空缺处依次填入[]
background: 任务型阅读。阅读短文，完成下面的任务。Look at these three animals. They are the giraffe, the panda and the pig. The giraffe is the tallest and the heaviest of the three. It is 5.48 metres. It’s really tall. It’s 900 kilograms! It likes eating leaves. The panda is shorter than the giraffe. It is 1.02 metres. But It’s taller than the pig. It’s 78 kilograms. It’s heavier than the pig, too. It likes eating bamboo. The pig is the shortest. It’s only 67 cm tall. How heavy is it? It’s 55 kilograms.
label: QA

question: Zhang Peng follows the traffic rules.[]
background: 阅读理解，判断正误Zhang: Excuse me, how do we get to the People's Park?Man: You can go there by the No. 5 bus, or you can go on foot.Zhang: How do we go on foot?Man: It's easy. Turn left at the traffic lights. The park is near a tall office building.John: Thank you very much. Hurry up, Zhang Peng!Zhang: No! The light is red. Stop!John: That's right. We have to wait.Zhang: Now it's green. Let's go!
original: (1) 通过文章中的“You can go there by the No. 5 bus.（你可以乘五号公车去。）”可以知道这道题目是错误的；(2) 通过文章中的“How do we go on foot?（我们走路怎样去？）”可以知道这道题目是正确的；(3) 通过文章中的“The park is near a tall office building.（公园在一栋高高的办公大楼附近。）”可以知道这道题目是错误的；(4)通过文章中的 John所说的“ Hurry up, Zhang Peng!（快点，张鹏！）”可以知道约翰在不知情的情况下，想要闯红灯，因此这道题目是正确的；(5) 通过文章中的“No! The light is red. Stop!（不！现在是红灯。停下来！）”可以知道，张鹏遵守交通规则，因此这道题目是正确的。
label: QA

question: John and Zhang Peng can't go to the park by the No. 5 bus.[]
background: 阅读理解，判断正误Zhang: Excuse me, how do we get to the People's Park?Man: You can go there by the No. 5 bus, or you can go on foot.Zhang: How do we go on foot?Man: It's easy. Turn left at the traffic lights. The park is near a tall office building.John: Thank you very much. Hurry up, Zhang Peng!Zhang: No! The light is red. Stop!John: That's right. We have to wait.Zhang: Now it's green. Let's go!
original: (1) 通过文章中的“You can go there by the No. 5 bus.（你可以乘五号公车去。）”可以知道这道题目是错误的；(2) 通过文章中的“How do we go on foot?（我们走路怎样去？）”可以知道这道题目是正确的；(3) 通过文章中的“The park is near a tall office building.（公园在一栋高高的办公大楼附近。）”可以知道这道题目是错误的；(4)通过文章中的 John所说的“ Hurry up, Zhang Peng!（快点，张鹏！）”可以知道约翰在不知情的情况下，想要闯红灯，因此这道题目是正确的；(5) 通过文章中的“No! The light is red. Stop!（不！现在是红灯。停下来！）”可以知道，张鹏遵守交通规则，因此这道题目是正确的。
label: QA

question: I’m looking forward to[](spend) the summer holiday at my grandmother’s home.
label: QA

question: Please give him a new book. (同义句)   ;Please _______a new book _____ him.空缺处依次填入[]
label: QA

question: I’d like [](go)to concerts.
label: QA

question: She always likes [](stay) at home.
label: QA

question: Thank you for [] (teach) us so well. We will miss you !
label: QA

question: Don’t be w[] about your Chinese.
label: QA

question: _your hobby swimming? — Yes,_.空缺处依次填入[]
original: 根据题意，可以猜测句子的大概意思是“— 你的爱好是游泳吗？— 是的，她的爱好是游泳。”，因此，本题可以填写“— Is your hobby swimming? — Yes, it is.
label: QA

question: There is [] (something) wrong with your computer. You can use it.
label: QA

question: I have got a bird [] (call) Polly. It can sing songs.
label: QA

question: We have two hands and ten [] (finger).
original: finger句意是我们有两只手还有十只手指头。根据句意可知，要使用名词复数形式fingers。
label: QA

question: 连词成句：did have what for you breakfast（?） []
answer: What did you have for breakfast?
original: 句意是你早餐吃什么了？根据问号可知，句型结构要使用疑问句形式。再结合句意可知，疑问代词what要放在句首，后接助动词did。再连接you，最后连接for breakfast。故填写What did you have for breakfast?
label: QA

question: Do you like the house on [](sell) ?
label: QA

question: 连词成句：see shall film we a Sunday this (?)[]
answer: Shall we see a film this Sunday?
original: 句意是我们应该这个周日观看电影吗？根据问号可知，句型结构属于shall引导的一般疑问句，shall要放在句首。再结合句意可知，we做主语，后接动词see a film，最后再连接时间this Sunday。故填写为Shall we see a film this Sunday?
label: QA

question: __ __your pen pal live? — She __ in Hong Kong.空缺处依次填入[]
original: 根据题意，可以猜测句子的意思是“你的笔友住在哪里？她住在香港。”因此本题应当填写“— Where does your pen pal live? — She lives in Hong
label: QA

question: This monkey is interesting. Shall we [] (play) with it?
label: QA

question: 把下面的句子重新排序。A. When?B: We are going to visit the Summer Palace and Tiananmen Square.C. Are you going to Beijing?D. Next week.E. How will you go to Beijing?F. Where are you going to visit in Beijing?G. By plane.H. Yes.顺序是[]
original: 根据对话的逻辑性首先确定第一句。C：你要去北京吗？H：是的。E：你怎样去北京？G：乘坐飞机。A：什么时候？D：下星期。F：你们要去北京哪里？B：我们要去颐和园和天安门广场。故重新排列的顺序为C，H，E，G，A，D，F，B。
label: QA

question: The boy is [] (worry) about his parents all the time.
label: QA

question: ______  your sister teach Chinese?— No,  ______  ______ math.空缺处依次填入[]
label: QA

question: Mike does his homework at home. (改为否定句)  Mike [] his homework at home.
label: QA

question: The city is our home．Please [](keep)it clean.
answer: 句意是这个城市就是我的家。请保持干净。根据句型结构属于please引导的祈使句的用法，要使用动词原形keep。
label: QA

question: It’s [](polite) to talk loudly in the reading room.
label: QA

question: Last year her hair_(be)short，but this year her hair _(be)long.空缺处依次填入[]
answer: 句意是去年她的头发是短的，但是今年她的头发是长的。根据关键词last year可知，此句属于一般过去时，动词要使用过去式was。根据this year可知，此句属于一般现在时，动词要使用is。故填写was，is。
label: QA

question: Tom often l[] home and goes to school at 7:30.
label: QA

question: 连词成句：not use we bags plastic should (.)[]
answer: 句意是我们不应该使用塑料袋。根据句意可知，人称代词we要做主语，后接动词shall not use。最后连接plastic bags。故填写We should not use plastic bags。
label: QA

question: Running is exercise.（改为一般疑问句）[]
label: QA

question: ______  your brother like swimming?— No, ______  ______.空缺处依次填入[]
original: 根据题意，可以猜测句子的大概意思是“— 你的弟弟喜欢游泳吗？— 不，他不喜欢。”，因此，本题可以填写“— Does your brother like swimming? — No, he doesn't.
label: QA

question: I saw many [] (kind)of cars in the car museum. Some are old．Some are new．
answer: 句意是我看见许多种小汽车在汽车博物馆里。一些是旧的，一些是新的。根据many要修饰可数名词复数可知，要填写kinds。
label: QA

question: Your new clothes [](be) very beautiful.
label: QA

question: He often makes a birthday cake for my birthday?(一般疑问句)  ______ ______ he often ____ for your birthday?空缺处依次填入[]
label: QA

question: I am good at PE and  [] in all of the sports. (interesting)
label: QA

question: The zoo is far from here．You must [] (take)the bus.
answer: 句意是你必须乘坐汽车。根据情态动词must可知，其后要使用动词原形take。故填写take。
label: QA

question: She is good at c[] and she is a good cook.
label: QA
